Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.logic

Class HashSubstitution

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.logic.HashSubstitution
All Implemented Interfaces:
Substitution, Serializable, Function<Object,Object>
public class HashSubstitution extends Object implements Serializable, Substitution
An implementation of the substitution interface backed by a hash map.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • HashSubstitution

      public HashSubstitution(Substitution previous)
      Constructs a new hash substitution that builds on a given existing substitution. The mappings in the existing substitution will also exist in this substitution. The existing substitution will not be modified when this substitution is modified.
      Parameters:
      previous - an existing substitution whose mappings will also be included in this substitution

    • HashSubstitution

      public HashSubstitution()
      Constructs a new empty hash substitution.

    • HashSubstitution

      public HashSubstitution(Object[] originals, Object[] replacements, Substitution previous)
      Constructs a new hash substitution initialized with the given mappings and which will build on a given existing substitution. The mappings in the existing substitution will also exist in this substitution. The existing substitution will not be modified when this substitution is modified.
      Parameters:
      originals - an array of objects to be replaced
      replacements - an array of objects to replace the original objects with
      previous - an existing substitution whose mappings will also be included in this substitution
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of replacement objects does not match the number of original objects

    • HashSubstitution

      public HashSubstitution(Object[] originals, Object[] replacements)
      Constructs a new hash substitution initialized with the given mappings.
      Parameters:
      originals - an array of objects to be replaced
      replacements - an array of objects to replace the original objects with
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of replacement objects does not match the number of original objects

    • HashSubstitution

      public HashSubstitution(Iterable<?> originals, Iterable<?> replacements, Substitution previous)
      Constructs a new hash substitution initialized with the given mappings and which will build on a given existing substitution. The mappings in the existing substitution will also exist in this substitution. The existing substitution will not be modified when this substitution is modified.
      Parameters:
      originals - an iterable of objects to be replaced
      replacements - an iterable of objects to replace the original objects with
      previous - an existing substitution whose mappings will also be included in this substitution
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of replacement objects does not match the number of original objects

    • HashSubstitution

      public HashSubstitution(Iterable<?> originals, Iterable<?> replacements)
      Constructs a new hash substitution initialized with the given mappings.
      Parameters:
      originals - an iterable of objects to be replaced
      replacements - an iterable of objects to replace the original objects with
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of replacement objects does not match the number of original objects

    • HashSubstitution

      public HashSubstitution(Object original, Object replacement, Substitution previous)
      Constructs a new hash substitution initialized with a given mapping and which will build on a given existing substitution. The mappings in the existing substitution will also exist in this substitution. The existing substitution will not be modified when this substitution is modified.
      Parameters:
      original - an object to be replaced
      replacement - an object to replace the original object with
      previous - an existing substitution whose mappings will also be included in this substitution

    • HashSubstitution

      public HashSubstitution(Object original, Object replacement)
      Constructs a new hash substitution initialized with a given mapping.
      Parameters:
      original - an object to be replaced
      replacement - an object to replace the original object with

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public Object apply(Object original)
      Specified by:
      apply in interface Function<Object,Object>

    • replace

      public HashSubstitution replace(Object original, Object replacement)
      Maps an original object to a replacement object in this substitution's hash map and then returns this substitution. This method does not check whether the substitution is allowed.
      Specified by:
      replace in interface Substitution
      Parameters:
      original - the original object to be replaced
      replacement - the object to replace the original with
      Returns:
      this substitution, after it has been modified to include the mapping
